name: dangunland-mud-client
description: Web-based MUD client for DangunLand with retro 80s computer aesthetic

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm --workspace shared-ui run dev" "npm --workspace backend run dev" "npm --workspace web run dev"
scripts.dev:web: concurrently "npm --workspace shared-ui run dev" "npm --workspace backend run dev" "npm --workspace web run dev"
scripts.dev:electron: concurrently "npm --workspace shared-ui run dev" "npm --workspace electron run dev"
scripts.build: npm --workspace shared-ui run build && npm --workspace web run build
scripts.build:web: npm --workspace shared-ui run build && npm --workspace web run build
scripts.build:electron: npm --workspace shared-ui run build && npm --workspace electron run build
scripts.install-all: npm install && npm --workspace backend install && npm --workspace shared-ui install && npm --workspace web install && npm --workspace electron install

author: khunny7
